mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Crislip, Alvin D. Patient Age: 16. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Acute diarrhoea [diarrhea]. Treatment: Alter[illegible], astringents, tonics and stimulants. Result: Trasferred to US Genl Hospital Grafton, 1864/09/23.
